import React,{useState} from 'react' import "./auth_box.css" import img1 from "../../assets/7.jpeg" import img2 from "../../assets/8.jpeg" import MediaQuery from 'react-responsive' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Auth_box(props) { const auth_type = props.props const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; return (
{auth_type}

Enter your details to {auth_type.toLowerCase()}

{ auth_type != "Login" ? (<> ) : <> }
Having trouble {auth_type == "Login" ? ("logging in") : ("signing up")}
{ }}> {auth_type == "Login" ? (
Don't have an account
) : (
Already have an account
)}
) } export default Auth_box
